data.name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mini-Album Track 6 - Teenage Blues
data.detailed_description:
We're excited to bring you Capcom Arcade Stadium's theme song "Teenage Blues"!

The sixth track of the Capcom Arcade Stadium: Mini-Album is a playful yet grown-up rock song performed by Sho-ta with Tenpack riverside rock'n roll band.

Written and performed by veteran Japanese musicians, the song, also featured in the launch trailer, invites you to experience the nostalgia of playing games in the arcade.
